entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Badger
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:21 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 01:30 AM NST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -26.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -29.1°C
Wind: NNE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 27 February 2023
